dmca.title: [ThePlanetAbuse-C3819149N] Copyright violation on one of your servers
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern: Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not substantially comply with the required notification elements of the Digital Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA"). Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your claim. Please visit our web site at www.theplanet.com/about_us/legal_docs/ThePlanet%20Copyright%20Infringeme nt%2001%2015%2007%20FINAL.pdf Legal Response Team THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC. -----Original Message----- From: abuse@theplanet.com [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] Sent: Tuesday, April 10, 2007 10:51 PM To: DMCA Subject: [ThePlanetAbuse-C3819149N] Copyright violation on one of your servers ==== Forwarded Ticket ==== 1. Copyright violation on one of your servers Added by system at Wednesday, Apr 11 2007 03:34 am X-MailFrom: john@jzstudios.com X-RcptTo: abacus@abacus.ev1servers.net Received: from [216.12.192.67] by [216.12.192.78] (abacus) for ; Wed Apr 11 03:34:32 2007 Received: (qmail 2840 invoked by alias); 11 Apr 2007 08:34:32 -0000 Delivered-To: abuse@inbound.abacus.ev1servers.net Received: (qmail 2837 invoked from network); 11 Apr 2007 08:34:32 -0000 Received: from unknown (HELO DALD2EXCH01.PLANET.LOCAL) (172.16.220.10) by inbound.abacus.ev1servers.net with SMTP; 11 Apr 2007 08:34:32 -0000 Received: from Exchanger.ev1servers.net ([207.218.222.101]) by DALD2EXCH01.PLANET.LOCAL with Microsoft SMTPSVC(6.0.3790.1830); Wed, 11 Apr 2007 03:34:31 -0500 Received: from mailin.ev1servers.net ([207.218.222.124]) by Exchanger.ev1servers.net with Microsoft SMTPSVC(6.0.3790.1830); Wed, 11 Apr 2007 03:34:31 -0500 X-ASG-Debug-ID: 1176280465-18775-158-0 X-Barracuda-URL: http://207.218.222.124:8000/cgi-bin/mark.cgi X-ASG-Recipient-Whitelist: abuse@ev1servers.net Received: from spunkymail-a14.g.dreamhost.com (sd-green-bigip-83.dreamhost.com [208.97.132.83]) by mailin.ev1servers.net (Spam Firewall) with ESMTP id EBE3970721 for ; Wed, 11 Apr 2007 03:34:30 -0500 (CDT) Received: from JZLaptop1 (c-68-34-151-13.hsd1.fl.comcast.net [68.34.151.13]) by spunkymail-a14.g.dreamhost.com (Postfix) with ESMTP id 65C15190E2A for ; Wed, 11 Apr 2007 01:34:15 -0700 (PDT) Message-ID: <000601c77c14$31c73f00$6601a8c0@JZLaptop1> From: "John Zawacki" To: X-ASG-Orig-Subj: Copyright violation on one of your servers Subject: Copyright violation on one of your servers Date: Wed, 11 Apr 2007 04:34:16 -0400 MIME-Version: 1.0 Content-Type: multipart/alternative; boundary="----=_NextPart_000_0003_01C77BF2.A9E18620" X-Priority: 3 X-MSMail-Priority: Normal X-Mailer: Microsoft Outlook Express 6.00.2900.3028 X-MimeOLE: Produced By Microsoft MimeOLE V6.00.2900.3028 X-Virus-Scanned: by Barracuda Spam Firewall at ev1servers.net X-Barracuda-Spam-Score: 0.00 X-Barracuda-Spam-Status: No, SCORE=0.00 using global scores of TAG_LEVEL=4.0 QUARANTINE_LEVEL=1000.0 KILL_LEVEL=8.0 WHITELISTED Return-Path: john@jzstudios.com X-OriginalArrivalTime: 11 Apr 2007 08:34:31.0181 (UTC) FILETIME=[39A763D0:01C77C14] (multipart/alternative) Multipart prefix (text/plain) This is a multi-part message in MIME format. MIME element (text/plain) Hello, My name is john Zawacki. I am a professional photographer in Florida. The website actionphotos.biz / online-pics.com located on one of your server is displaying images Illegally. The individual that owns the site hired myself and several photographers to take the pics but never paid them. Apparently he has done this many times before. see http://www.stopdariensmall.com for more about his exploits. I have contacted the legal department of the professoional photographes of america on this matter. Because the photographers were never paid all rights to the images belong to the individual photographers. I am requesting that all images from the turner event be removed immediately. If you have any Questions. Please contact me. John Zawacki 941-914-4152 MIME element (text/html)
Hello,
My name is john Zawacki. I am a professional photographer in Florida.
 
The website actionphotos.biz / online-pics.com located on one of your server is displaying images Illegally.
 
The individual that owns the site hired myself and several photographers to take the pics but never paid them. Apparently he has done this many times before.
see http://www.stopdariensmall.com  for more about his exploits.
 
I have contacted the legal department of the professoional photographes of america on this matter. Because the photographers were never paid all rights to the images belong to the individual photographers.
 
I am requesting that all images from the turner event be removed immediately.
 
If you have any Questions. Please contact me.
 
John Zawacki
941-914-4152
MIME element (text/plain)
